dashboard.hust: Hanoi University of Science and Technology
dashboard.welcome: Welcome to the BK Auto Club
dashboard.description: BK-AUTO Club was established in 2010 with the purpose of creating a scientific research playground for students of Hanoi University of Science and Technology in general and students of the Automotive and Specialized Vehicle Department of the Faculty of Mechanical Engineering in particular...

intro.subtitle: INTRODUCTION
intro.title: BK Auto Club
intro.description1: BK-AUTO Club was established in 2010 with the purpose of creating a scientific research playground for students of Hanoi University of Science and Technology in general and students of the Automotive and Specialized Vehicle Department of the Faculty of Mechanical Engineering in particular.
intro.description2: Formerly known as the Eco-Car Club - fuel economy with the tradition of participating in Honda's Eco-Driving competition, by 2021, BK-AUTO has expanded its scope of research, learning, and development to many different areas such as: electric vehicle simulation, electronic system design on cars, IT applications in cars... to participate in student scientific research competitions inside and outside the school such as: Polytechnic Youth Creativity, Student Scientific Research Month, EMC Honda, ...
intro.description2-short: Formerly known as the Eco-Car Club - fuel economy with a tradition of participating in Honda's Eco-Driving competition,...
